title: Add instructor photo to the Biodata page

requirements.text: Create an optimized, square portrait image asset from the uploaded file IMG-20220513-WA0015.jpg and add it as a static file under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png.
The image is a square 512x512 portrait crop with the subject centered and minimal background distractions.
The image is visually suitable for use as a portrait (clean edges, not stretched, not pixelated).

requirements.text: Update the /biodata page (frontend/src/pages/biodata/BiodataPage.tsx) to display the new portrait image near the top of the page while keeping the existing Biodata heading and the two existing sections (Professional Summary, Core Competencies) intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The /biodata page renders the portrait image from /assets/generated/biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png.
The image includes English alt text (e.g., "Instructor portrait").
The existing headings and body text currently shown on /biodata remain present and unchanged.
The layout is responsive (image and text look good on mobile and desktop) and uses existing Tailwind styling conventions in the file.

constraints: Do not add any backend changes; this is a frontend-only update using a static asset.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Creating a new biodata route or changing navigation (the /biodata page already exists).
Adding an image upload feature or storing the photo in the backend.

required: Square portrait photo crop with subject centered, reduced background distractions (biodata-portrait.dim_512x512.png)
